meta.query: #原来罗云熙也是这么追剧的#

response.msg:
嗯，用户搜索了"原来罗云熙也是这么追剧的"这个话题，看起来是想了解罗云熙的追剧习惯，尤其是和他自己主演的《水龙吟》相关的内容。用户可能是罗云熙的粉丝，或者是对这部剧感兴趣的观众，想看看明星追剧和普通人有什么不同。

我看到了很多搜索结果，大部分都集中在2025年10月27日《水龙吟》的微博追剧团活动上。罗云熙在这次活动中透露了自己追剧的习惯：他会看两遍，第一遍关弹幕专注剧情，第二遍开弹幕看网友评论。这个习惯引起了很多网友的共鸣，觉得和自己追剧方式一模一样。

还有一些有趣的细节，比如罗云熙会特别留意剧中的热梗，像"被关鸟笼"这个情节，网友调侃说"池云是平衡鸟笼的秤砣"，罗云熙在追剧团现场还幽默回应了这个梗。他在现场的反应也很可爱，比如即兴挽住肖顺尧的胳膊演绎"撒娇式生气"。

除了追剧习惯，还有一些关于《水龙吟》这部剧本身的信息。罗云熙在剧中饰演唐俪辞，是个很复杂的角色，武力、智力、财力都是天花板级别的。他为了演好这个角色做了很多准备，强调要自己先相信这个角色是真实存在的。从观众反馈来看，这部剧的评价似乎不错。

我还注意到一些粉丝的追剧方式更疯狂，有人自称一天看三遍，有人分不同设备观看。罗云熙的追剧习惯让粉丝觉得他特别真实、接地气。

有一个小彩蛋是罗云熙在追剧团现场清唱了《富士山下》，氛围感十足。不过这个和追剧习惯关系不大，可能可以作为补充信息。

在整理信息时，我会重点突出罗云熙的追剧习惯这个核心信息，然后补充一些相关的趣闻和背景信息。考虑到用户可能是粉丝，我会用一些活泼的语言，但保持信息的准确性。我会避免简单罗列账号内容，而是把信息整合成连贯的叙述。

我会按照这个思路组织回答：先介绍罗云熙的追剧习惯，然后说说他如何与网友互动玩梗，接着分享活动现场的趣事，再补充一些角色背景和观众反馈，最后提一下粉丝的共鸣反应。这样应该能全面覆盖用户想了解的内容。


以下是关于罗云熙追剧习惯的详细整理，综合他在《水龙吟》追剧团活动中的自述及观众反馈：
### 一、**追剧方式：关弹幕与开弹幕双模式**```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 2, "data": {"num": [1, 3, 16, 35], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "中网传播", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226520303109602", "index": 35, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "福多多剧有福", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226371315926637", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "明星时尚", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226399381062103", "index": 3, "label": ""}, {"name": "_一条更新", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226391818996847", "index": 16, "label": ""}], "name": "中网传播", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1000.1000.50/0086ll1lly8hw9cc28gcpj30rs0rs3yx.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761646519&ssig=2ad00iWX4r", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226520303109602", "vType": 3}}```
1. **第一遍沉浸式纯享**
观看自己主演的《水龙吟》时，罗云熙会先关闭弹幕，专注剧情细节和表演张力。例如分析唐俪辞探案的逻辑、江湖阴谋的伏笔，避免弹幕干扰对角色内核的理解。

2. **第二遍弹幕社交体验**
二刷时特意开启弹幕，收集网友的创意解读和热梗。例如剧中“唐俪辞与池云被关鸟笼”的桥段，网友调侃“池云是秤砣维持笼子平衡”，罗云熙幽默接梗：“敖子逸起到平衡作用”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 4, "data": {"num": [35, 44], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "曼玉也是金镶玉", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226395674609851", "index": 44, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "中网传播", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226520303109602", "index": 35, "label": ""}], "name": "曼玉也是金镶玉", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/005ZGK5cly8hva7oip1hyj30e80e83yy.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761646519&ssig=3ulq905qa5", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226395674609851", "vType": 0}}```
福多多剧有福
明星时尚
_一条更新

### 二、**互动玩梗：与观众同步“追剧仪式感”**```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [18, 27, 30], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "咪咕视频", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226393853495187", "index": 30, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "爱吃黑松露的猹", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226396993454849", "index": 18, "label": ""}, {"name": "小朋友冷静点", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226391567077035", "index": 27, "label": ""}], "name": "咪咕视频", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/001YscZNly8hynliro7t2j60go0go0tb02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761646519&ssig=2x4c%2B0MEoH", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226393853495187", "vType": 3}}```
- **热梗回应**：对弹幕中“阿俪看不见我”（柳眼角色留言）等趣味互动，他笑称“直播间有男鬼味儿”，主动融入观众语境。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 6, "data": {"num": [35], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "中网传播", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226520303109602", "index": 35, "label": ""}]}}```
- **自曝幕后趣事**：提及拍摄“鸟笼戏”时，即兴调侃搭档敖子逸是“平衡笼子的秤砣”，将荒诞设定转化为出圈热梗。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 7, "data": {"num": [44], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "曼玉也是金镶玉", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226395674609851", "index": 44, "label": ""}]}}```
### 三、**现场还原：即兴表演与友情互动**```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 8, "data": {"num": [2, 31], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "酥酥尖叫姬", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226380469731706", "index": 2, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "Miss·Slytherin", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226412829312563", "index": 31, "label": ""}], "name": "酥酥尖叫姬", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/9c776629ly8grklo8awolj20u00u076e.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761646519&ssig=dLio4BQfFR", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226380469731706", "vType": 0}}```
1. **吃瓜表情包名场面**
与肖顺尧（饰沈郎魂）观看其他演员表演时，两人同步露出“在线嗑CP”的吃瓜表情，被粉丝抓拍戏称“敌对变嗑糖”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [2], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "酥酥尖叫姬", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226380469731706", "index": 2, "label": ""}]}}```
2. **撒娇式改戏**
主持人要求还原剧中“抱柱子生气”情节，罗云熙即兴挽住肖顺尧胳膊演绎“撒娇式生气”：抿嘴浅笑、眼神无辜捏衣袖，颠覆角色高冷形象。
3. **拦截剧透攻防战**
肖顺尧多次试图剧透未播剧情，均被罗云熙淡定拦截：“没播！”两人互动被赞“内娱活人样本”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 11, "data": {"num": [2], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "酥酥尖叫姬", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226380469731706", "index": 2, "label": ""}]}}```
酥酥尖叫姬

### 四、**角色共鸣：演员视角的深度解读**```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 12, "data": {"num": [8, 10, 35], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "门徒电影", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226392109190016", "index": 8, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "岁岁相熙丨罗云熙", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226392646323971", "index": 10, "label": ""}, {"name": "中网传播", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226520303109602", "index": 35, "label": ""}], "name": "门徒电影", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1024.1024.50/005C7GY8ly8i6kx4k9p34j30sg0sgtbp.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761646519&ssig=yQWtaMD9rk", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226392109190016", "vType": 0}}```
- **表演理念**：罗云熙强调需“相信角色真实存在”，例如演绎唐俪辞时通过心理建设传递其“武力智力天花板”的复杂性，避免角色浮于表面。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 13, "data": {"num": [8, 10], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "岁岁相熙丨罗云熙", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226392646323971", "index": 10, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "门徒电影", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226392109190016", "index": 8, "label": ""}], "name": "岁岁相熙丨罗云熙", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.828.828.50/6a4c2b02ly8goco5f2spdj20n00n0myh.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761646519&ssig=7apHHkFE3b", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226392646323971", "vType": 0}}```
- **细节即兴创作**：剧中微表情多为现场反应，如面对对手演员时即兴调整神态，强化角色间关系张力。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 14, "data": {"num": [10], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "岁岁相熙丨罗云熙", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226392646323971", "index": 10, "label": ""}]}}```
门徒电影
岁岁相熙丨罗云熙

### 五、**观众反响：全民共鸣的追剧DNA**```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 15, "data": {"num": [18, 26, 34], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "爱吃黑松露的猹", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226396993454849", "index": 18, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "风中的云熙", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226506273952080", "index": 26, "label": ""}, {"name": "追熙追兮", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226403341012123", "index": 34, "label": ""}], "name": "爱吃黑松露的猹", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/a21866ecly8i0qve3fjkbj20e80e80t5.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761646519&ssig=qVcCJIQkro", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226396993454849", "vType": 0}}```
- 粉丝直呼“世另我”：“关弹幕看剧情，开弹幕找搭子，罗云熙演我追剧日常！”```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 16, "data": {"num": [18, 27], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "小朋友冷静点", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226391567077035", "index": 27, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "爱吃黑松露的猹", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226396993454849", "index": 18, "label": ""}], "name": "小朋友冷静点", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/d73d3ef5ly8h08nam854kj20u00u0gmg.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761646519&ssig=n9Cj7T1AzR", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226391567077035", "vType": 0}}```
- 更疯狂粉丝模式：有人自称“一天刷三遍”（手机、电视、上班偷看），称剧情需反复品味细节。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 17, "data": {"num": [25, 26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "一条佛系闲鱼", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225692649230747", "index": 25, "label": ""}, {"name": "风中的云熙", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226506273952080", "index": 26, "label": ""}]}}```
### 附：**《水龙吟》热播彩蛋**```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 18, "data": {"num": [1, 17, 23], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "钱江视频", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226401630524854", "index": 17, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "福多多剧有福", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226371315926637", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "钱江视频", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226401425000317", "index": 23, "label": ""}], "name": "钱江视频", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/67f865afly8h8vg6w30czj20e80e8t92.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761646519&ssig=DR8IJXGEU8", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226401630524854", "vType": 3}}```
- **清唱名场面**：追剧团现场罗云熙清唱《富士山下》，粤语氛围感拉满，观众高呼“开演唱会！”```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 19, "data": {"num": [17], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "钱江视频", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226401630524854", "index": 17, "label": ""}]}}```
- **剧组整活**：杨仕泽打木鱼唱“水龙吟版”《万物生》：“如果你想追剧一定是《水龙吟》”，引爆笑点。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 20, "data": {"num": [23], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "钱江视频", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226401425000317", "index": 23, "label": ""}]}}```

罗云熙的追剧哲学本质是 **“专业复盘+观众视角”的双重融合**——既以演员身份雕琢作品，又以“剧粉”心态拥抱集体观剧文化，打破荧幕内外界限。正如网友锐评：“别人演戏他吃瓜，自己吃瓜成喜剧人！”```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 21, "data": {"num": [1, 35], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "福多多剧有福", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226371315926637", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "中网传播", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226520303109602", "index": 35, "label": ""}], "name": "福多多剧有福", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/6d3c4072ly8geruprm1d7j20u00u040o.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761646519&ssig=VY8kz547KJ", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226371315926637", "vType": 0}}```
